content.raw:
I ran gzclient in gdb, reproduced this crash, and got this stack trace:

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff76260dd in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (this=0x4ec7e10, 
    _visible=_visible@entry=false, _cascade=_cascade@entry=true)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
1512	  this->dataPtr->sceneNode->setVisible(_visible, _cascade);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff76260dd in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (
    this=0x4ec7e10, _visible=_visible@entry=false, 
    _cascade=_cascade@entry=true)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
#1  0x00000000004bb487 in gazebo::gui::ModelSnap::Reset (
    this=0x7f7ca0 <SingletonT<gazebo::gui::ModelSnap>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/ModelSnap.cc:116
#2  0x0000000000471523 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnManipMode (this=0x19242a0, 
    _mode=...) at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:970
#3  0x00000000004a8164 in operator() (a0=..., this=0x1945df0)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:767
#4  gazebo::event::EventT<void (std::string)>::Signal<char [7]>(char const (&) [7]) (this=0x7f8200 <gazebo::gui::Events::manipMode>, _p=...)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:341
#5  0x00007ffff578887a in QMetaObject::activate(QObject*, QMetaObject const*, int, void**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#6  0x00007ffff5c9fa62 in QAction::triggered(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff5ca14d6 in QAction::activate(QAction::ActionEvent) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#8  0x000000000047239c in trigger (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/qt4/QtGui/qaction.h:218
#9  gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnModelEditor (this=0x19242a0)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:1149
```
Not sure how to further isolate this problem--it looks like it may be hidden behind `Ogre::SceneNode`.
content.html:
I ran gzclient in gdb, reproduced this crash, and got this stack trace:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff76260dd in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (this=0x4ec7e10, 
    _visible=_visible@entry=false, _cascade=_cascade@entry=true)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
1512      this->dataPtr->sceneNode->setVisible(_visible, _cascade);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff76260dd in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (
    this=0x4ec7e10, _visible=_visible@entry=false, 
    _cascade=_cascade@entry=true)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
#1  0x00000000004bb487 in gazebo::gui::ModelSnap::Reset (
    this=0x7f7ca0 <SingletonT<gazebo::gui::ModelSnap>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/ModelSnap.cc:116
#2  0x0000000000471523 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnManipMode (this=0x19242a0, 
    _mode=...) at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:970
#3  0x00000000004a8164 in operator() (a0=..., this=0x1945df0)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:767
#4  gazebo::event::EventT<void (std::string)>::Signal<char [7]>(char const (&) [7]) (this=0x7f8200 <gazebo::gui::Events::manipMode>, _p=...)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:341
#5  0x00007ffff578887a in QMetaObject::activate(QObject*, QMetaObject const*, int, void**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#6  0x00007ffff5c9fa62 in QAction::triggered(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff5ca14d6 in QAction::activate(QAction::ActionEvent) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#8  0x000000000047239c in trigger (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/qt4/QtGui/qaction.h:218
#9  gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnModelEditor (this=0x19242a0)
    at /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:1149

Not sure how to further isolate this problem--it looks like it may be hidden behind Ogre::SceneNode.
